event.title: Open Source Presentation
event.description:
A panel of speakers with experience in Open Source Software will be talking about some of the Open Source Projects they've worked on. We will have representation from Fedora , phpBB , ScummVM , Our very own Sakai , Apache and Open Systems Solutions . This will be a great opportunity to learn more about the Open Source Movement, and get information to start working on an Open Source Project of your own.
Free Burritos from Moe's will be provided as refreshments.
